Texts.Eng:
An unusual psionic species of extremophiles. Can generate a powerful psionic vibration through sheer willpower.

 Diet: Any, including prepared Isotopes.
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 Resist: ^green;30%^reset; Electric, ^green;15%^reset; Ice , ^green;20%^reset; Mental Protection
 Immune: Slipping, Electrified
 Tech: ^green;Psionic Wave^reset;
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 On ^green;electrically charged or crystal^reset; biomes, gain ^green;10% speed^reset;
 On ^green;cold^reset; biomes, gain ^green;10% Protection^reset;
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Psionic Ejector:  +^green;20%^reset; damage
 Quarterstaff: +^green;10%^reset; Dmg, +^green;15%^reset; Protection
 Magnorbs: ^green;+15%^reset; Dmg, +^green;10%^reset; Protection
    
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 ^red;23%^reset; Cosmic and Shadow
 ^red;-10%^reset; Charisma
